title: Ernie the Elephant in Henry Brags
description: Are your kids good at sports?  Do your kids like to brag or tease?     Fully illustrated,Children's book for ages 2-6  ** Read it FREE as part of your PRIME or Kindle Unlimited membership **  This is the story of a boastful elephant that likes to tease people so much that he has chased his friends away.Nobody wants to play with him because they cannot take his constant abuse and self flattery. It is a heart warming tale of courage as Ernie takes on the bully and wins.Aimed at 2-5 year olds, the story is perfect pairing of elegant verse and colorful illustrations.This book is fun for the whole family.
author: Leela Hope
